package lambdaEX;

public interface book {
	double pi=3.14;
	
	void bookName(String name);
	double bookPrice(double price);
	
	static void CompanyName(String name)
	{
		System.out.println("公司名:"+name);
	}
	
	default String Title(String msg)
	{
		return "標題:"+msg;
	}

}

class bookStore implements book
{

	@Override
	public void bookName(String name) {
		System.out.println("書名:"+name);
		
	}

	@Override
	public double bookPrice(double price) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		return price*0.95;
	}
	
}
